message:
Hello Stephan, I am working on a cross platform project that targets WPF(Desktop), Windows Phone, Android(Xamarin) and iOS(Xamarin).

I used TAP pattern as you described, WPF works with no problem, but mobile platforms are not.

Xamarin throws SerializationException, saying that: text is retrieved instead of task, Here is a qustion in stack overflow : [https://stackoverflow.com/questions/25376930/wcf-task-based-service-consumption-in-xamarin](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/25376930/wcf-task-based-service-consumption-in-xamarin)
